name: Potions
description: Wizarding chemistry that can melt your body if done in a wrong way.
reviews: Nice one.
Had a good time in the course.
Had a good time melting my arms for a cauldraun of frogs.

tutors.name: Paul
tutors.bio: Hey there! I am Paul and welcome to my course. I swear I'll make your hands swell from the potions you make. Don't worry it's not painful as you think it is. (It's just a bit more painful than that.)

tutors.name: Neveille
tutors.bio: Hey! I am Neveille and welcome to my course. I will guide you through the course and teach you from the absolute basics.

name: Defence against the Dark Arts
description: This course is all about the guts you have.
reviews: Nice one.

Had a good time with the weird stuff.
